# **Sherry (Qiang) Fu**


### About me

Greetings! Welcome to my website. My name is Sherry (Qiang) Fu, and I'm currently an Assistant Professor in Management at Colorado State University.

As a researcher, my interests lie in the areas of organizational helping behaviors, employee affect and emotions, motivation and stress, and quantitative research methods. 

Thank you for visiting my page, and please feel free to reach out to me.
